summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the behavior of aggregation and annotation operations in the ORM, covering basic aggregates, annotations, duplicate column handling, relation traversals, filters, group‑by, having, distinct, F‑expressions, values queries, and various edge‑case scenarios.
business_intent: To guarantee that aggregation and annotation features work correctly across a wide range of use cases, preventing regressions and ensuring reliable query generation and result handling in the application.
